content.description: The writer wants sentence 17 (reproduced below) to summarize key aspects of the passage’s argument.
content.question: The Eleutherna researchers, supplementing Greece’s archaeological discoveries, acknowledge that they have more to learn.Which of the following versions of the underlined portion of sentence 17 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: excited by how this finding reinforces the other surprising discoveries at Eleutherna
inspired by a contemporary craftswoman to rethink their preconceived ideas about women’s labor in the ancient world
adding to our knowledge of a period of Greek history known as the Iron Age due to the importance of iron working during this time

content.answer: inspired by a contemporary craftswoman to rethink their preconceived ideas about women’s labor in the ancient world

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
